articles.description: The Goods and Services Tax (GST) revenue for the month of June surged by 56% on an annual basis to nearly Rs 1.45 lakh crore as against Rs 1.4 lakh crore in May, revealed finance minister Nirmala Sitharaman on Friday.

articles.author: ET Spotlight
articles.title: CBSE Term 2 Results 2022: Class 10th, 12th results to be out soon
articles.description: CBSE is expected to announce the Class 10 results around July 4 and Class 12 results around July 10. The board, however, has not announced any date yet.
articles.content: The Central Board of Secondary Education is expected to announce CBSE Class 10th and Class 12th Term-2 board exam results 2022 soon. As per the latest update, CBSE is expected that results for Class … [+852 chars]

articles.author: ET CONTRIBUTORS
articles.title: View: Udaipur killing may bring new dynamic in complex jihadist landscape
articles.description: In Indian context, there are primarily three sources of Islamist radicalization and terrorism. Pakistan-based terrorist organizations top the list.
articles.content: The brutal killing of a Hindu shopkeeper by two Muslim youth in Rajasthans Udaipur district has raised serious concerns about the scope and dynamics of Islamist radicalization in India. The two radic… [+8033 chars]

articles.author: PTI
articles.title: Shiv Sena is where Thackerays are; new govt formed by BJP with group that split Sena: Sanjay Raut
articles.description: Shiv Sena leader Sanjay Raut on Friday said a new government in Maharashtra under Eknath Shinde has been formed by the BJP with a group of MLAs that split the party, and asserted that the Sena is where the Thackerays are. "We will try to expand our party unde…
